description:
I'm running openstack mostly nova on my laptop. Have been getting weird errors about running out of disk space while my disk is only 60% full. Turns out nova has created one million log files under /var/log/nova/* that exhausted all available inodes

I am attaching a `ls -l` of all log files before I deleted them
title: nova logs exhaust all inodes

comments.content:
This should be fixed in the latest upload. If you're on Natty, you should already have it. If you're on Maverick, feel free to fresh packages from our PPA (built from the same packaging as the Natty packages).

The PPA  is ppa:nova-core/trunk (in add-apt-repository parlance)
